name: Us & Them
summary:
“Us and Them” is a turn-based strategy game about cold war that you can play either as CIA or KGB.
Although it is a game of territorial expansion, the rivals do not attack their opponent using military force. Instead they are using an army of Spies, Assassins and Experts of various kinds (like economy, technology etc.) in order to destabilize the enemy's countries socially, economically, politically and finally to change their governments’ ideology and attach them in their own political block.

The player will have to manage resources like money, oil and technology. He must place his units strategically on the map and create a series of spy networks waiting for the right moment to unleash a series of sabotages, assassinations, bribes, revolutions, arrests and interrogations of enemy units. Since most of the units are hidden to the enemy, the collection and interception of crucial information about the countries, the units' attributes and their whereabouts is essential for victory.

name: Us vs. Them
summary: The is a laserdisc-based horizontal and vertical shoot-em-up. The game features scrolling video with overlayed computer-generated graphics. Clips of live acting are interwoven into the plot: fighting off an alien attack of earth.

name: U.S.A.A.F. - United States Army Air Force
Use Your Words
summary:
Grab a few friends and get ready to laugh. Use Your Words is the party game for funny people and their unfunny friends!

Use Your Words is a game that invites players to respond to a variety of mini-games and prompts with the funniest answers they can think of! Players play using their phones and tablets as controllers, making game-play seamless and quick to pick up. Players who get stumped can use one of the hidden "House Answers" to lay a trap for their fellow players once it's time for everyone to vote for their favorite.

Whether you're a total novice or a world-famous comedian, we guarantee hours of non-stop hilarity. So, grab a few friends and get ready to laugh along with Use Your Words!

name: Usagi Yojimbo: Way of the Ronin
summary: Usagi Yojimbo: Way of the Ronin is a new, old school game based on the classic Dark Horse Comic Graphic Novel by Stan Sakai, and seen in the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles over the years. This is an old school, simple, fun Retro brawler done in the vein of the classic TMNT Stand Up Arcade game.

name: Ushio to Tora
summary: Ushio to Tora is a side-scrolling platform game by Yukata and based on a popular Japanese manga and anime series. It tells the story of Aotsuki Ushio, the son of a temple priest who lives in the family's shrine.

name: U.S. Championship V'Ball
summary: Play as two muscle-bound beach heroes playing volleyball in cities across the USA. The game features funky music and challenging game play. Computer opponent skills grow greater as levels increase or play against a human opponent.

name: US AAF Mustang
summary:
USAAF Mustang is a horizontally scrolling shoot 'em up arcade game originally developed by NMK, and published by UPL in 1990. It was ported a year later to the Sega Mega Drive by Taito while being renamed Fire Mustang. NMK Co. Ltd. also developed the Sega Mega Drive version.

The game is a very standard horizontal scrolling shoot em' up with only one type of available weapon and a bomb weapon. Players took on a fictional campaign in a World War II setting as a USAAF fighter pilot in a titular North American P-51 Mustang against the Nazi Luftwaffe and the Imperial Japanese Navy Air Service.

name: U.S. Classic
summary: A basic golf game that starts with a view from the tee that shows wind velocity, direction and distance to the green. Choose your club and swing by rolling the track-ball with the desired force and direction. Extra holes given for par and under par.

name: USCF Chess
summary: Game features include taking back and redoing moves, rotating the game board 180 degrees, and setting up the chess board for special moves and instances. When playing against the CPU, players can also switch sides with the computer to make a move for the CPU. If the computer takes too long to make a move, the player may force the CPU to immediately make the best move it can think of, or cause the game to make an audible tone and pause before making the move.

name: U.S. Ski Team Skiing
summary:
In U.S. Ski Team Skiing, players race down the hill, avoiding trees and jumping moguls in their path. The game features both slalom and downhill courses. 1 player may race against the clock, or 2 to 6 players can alternate turns and race to see who gets the fastest time, and each race has 3 heats. 
 
Both downhill and slalom courses have 15 different slope grade settings to affect acceleration. 4 different settings for overall game speed are also available.

name: USS Ticonderoga: Life and Death on the Hight Seas
summary: USS Ticonderoga lets you command a Ticonderoga-class missile cruiser in a real-time naval combat simulation. There are three theaters of operation: the Persian Gulf, the North Atlantic or the Sea of Japan and you will have to take your ship there and try to keep the peace and carry out your missions.

name: Ushio to Tora: Shinen no Daiyou
summary: Ushio to Tora: Shinen no Daiyou is a Role-Playing game, developed by Pixel and published by Yutaka, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: U-Sing
summary: Sing the greatest hits with Universal Music

name: USS Tlancy
summary: A bullet hell game where players control a battleship fighting against other ships and incoming aircraft. Visually similar to Luftrausers.

name: USA Racer
summary:
A clandestine group has been organizing illegal street races in the USA for more than 50 years. What started as a fun event has grown into an annual contest for cash and glory. Only six are given a chance to prove their worth.

US Racer contains 11 tracks in different locations across the USA. Players can race in cities such as Los Angeles, New York or Washington DC or can take part in a race through the Grand Canyon or Yellowstone. Next to Time Trial and Single Race, the Tournament is the main event. It has been split up in three sections: Park Trial, City Trial and US Race. After completing a section, the next one is opened up.

The tracks contain obstacles and jumps. Enemies will try to push other cars off the road, and the police also make an appearance. Scattered around the tracks are power-ups that repair the car, provide boost or cash. The money can be used to upgrade the car, repair it or buy boost prior to the race. After completing an entire tournament with a certain car, an alternate vehicle becomes available for that character.

In the Windows version two-player duels are available over LAN or TCP/IP. Players can either go head-to-head or play a game of Cop vs. Racer.

name: US History: Western Settlement to Modern Day
U.S. Navy Fighters - Marine Fighters
summary: An expansion pack to U.S. Navy Fighters,

name: U.S. Most Wanted: Nowhere to Hide
summary: A first-person shooter with attempts at simulation-centric gameplay, primarily comprised of fighting criminal and terrorist threats around the world for vaguely defined reasons.

name: Ushinawareta Mirai wo Motomete
summary: In Search of the Lost Future is set in Uchihama Academy (内浜学園, Uchihama Gakuen) and with the number of new students at the school increasing every year, a new school building is constructed. Before they move to the new building, the school will hold one last General Club Festival at the old building before it is closed down. Each of the clubs decide to give it their all to make it a success. Sō Akiyama is a member of the astronomy club, and just before the festival begins, the student executive committee asks the club's members to calm the uneasiness among the students in regard to mysterious incidents at the old building. When Yui Furukawa, a quiet girl, transfers late into the school year and appears before Sō, the gears of fate slowly begin to move.

name: U.S. Navy Fighters
summary: U.S. Navy Fighters is a video game developed and published by Electronic Arts for the PC. An expansion pack, Marine Fighters, was released in 1995. U.S. Navy Fighters: Gold was also released in 1995, it is a compilation package that includes both the main game and the expansion. U.S. Navy Fighters is a forerunner to Jane's Combat Simulations series. An updated version, Jane's US Navy Fighters 97, was released in 1996 for Microsoft Windows and is officially part of the series.

name: Usotsuki Game
summary: When the protagonist wakes up, he finds himself locked up with several men and women he doesn't know... At that moment, an announcement sounds "come on, let the liar game begin!"

name: U-Sing 2
summary:
Sing 40 Hits With Your Favourite British and International Stars!  
  
U-SING 2, the new karaoke Wii game edition, offers to everyone the best-selling hits of the most successful British and international singers, such as Lady Gaga, Coldplay, The Libertines, Bloc Party, Franz Ferdinand, Pixie Lott, Florence + The Machine, David Guetta and many more!

name: U-Sing: Johnny Hallyday
summary: The first karaoke game on Wii dedicated to Johnny Hallyday! Enter the legend by performing Johnny Hallyday's most cult songs! Revisit Johnny Hallyday's legendary hits and best shows in their original version and share unforgettable karaoke moments!

name: U-Sing: Girls Night
summary: You know you’ve got talent and now it’s time to show the world with the launch Universal Music’s official Wii singing game. U-Sing: Girls Night is packed full of new and classic hits from your favourite female artists. So you and your girlfriends can sing your hearts out and battle against each other for ultimate pop stardom.

name: US Coin
summary:
Designed for serious to casual collectors. If you are looking for coin collecting software for Apple Mac's, you've come to the right place. This is a full-featured App, with an extensive Dictionary of US Minted Coins, and it works in conjunction with your iPad or iPhones (purchased separately).

Now supports creating multiple collections. These collections can be shared across iPhone, iPad, and Mac Computers. Perhaps ideal for getting a son or granddaughter interested in coin collecting, Grandpa can setup a collection for them then send it to them via Dropbox (Backup on Grandpa's Computer, Restore on Grandchild's).

Main Features:
- Coin Dictionary
- Reports
- Emailing
- Excel Integration

Coin Dictionary with the App is extensive:

* Half-Cents, Cents 
* Two and Three Cents 
* Nickels 
* Half-Dimes, Dimes 
* Quarters 
* Half Dollars 
* Dollars 
* Proof and Mint Sets 
* Gold Coins 
* Bullion Coins 
* Early American Colonials 
* Patterns 
* Commemoratives 
* Territorial 

iPhone, iPad, MacBook, and Windows
Would you like to be able to use the App on multiple Apple mobile devices? We have a solution for that. The Backup / Restore feature allows you to backup a copy of your collection on your iPhone, and then Restore the backup to perhaps your iPad. This makes it easy to sync your collection between your various Apple devices. 

Enjoy sharing photo's of your trophies? We offer unlimited photos. Use that high-resolution camera in your iPhone to snap photo's of your coins, then Backup the collection to the Cloud and restore to your iPad and Apple MacBook for viewing. 

Wonder what it's worth, we show you Heritage Auctions Archives (#1 Coin Auction House in the World) AND EBay auctions for your coin, one at a time.
 
Did we mention Reports? Yes, we have reports covering basic inventory, buy-lists, detailed financial analysis, and more. Better yet, you can choose between printing or emailing to a friend or maybe your Accountant.

Reports:
-Financial summary
-Estimated market summary
-Profit & Loss
-Coin details
-Buy list
-Advanced P & L
-Insurance Details
-Physical Inventory 

Excel:
Most recently, we added support for opening your collection to view and edit using Microsoft Excel. Making changes of your collection using an Excel Spreadsheet make it easy to copy settings (Location, Variety, Supplier, etc.) to a large number of coins and doing so very easily. 

Has it all, a truly best-in-class product and we are just getting started. Come join the fun. 

Please visit our support site http://saintsoftware.blogspot.com/ 

If you buy the product, decide there's a feature you'd really love us to add -- please let us know. Our goal is to delight you, and help make Coin collecting fun and interesting.

Enjoy- 
john kountz 
chief software architect & president 
support@SaintsSoft.com 

PS.
Preview this App before buying, watch our FREE Tutorials on our Support Website.

name: USA Today Crossword Challenge
summary:
USA Today Crossword Challenge offers you hundreds of different crossword puzzles on a grid of up to 15x15 squares in size.

The game is controlled via the Nintendo DS stylus and onscreen icons. Answers to the questions can either be written directly into the game via the writing recognition area in the game or by bringing up a full keyboard.

name: Ushiro
summary:
Ushiro is a turn-based RPG which features a young protagonist interacting with ghosts in real-world Japanese locations, such as Tokyo's Shibuya district. Despite receiving write ups, trailers and gameplay footage, the supposed PSP title never saw the light of day.

However, according to Famitsu's interview with Level 5 President Akihiro Hino, Ushiro is back on the books and will be coming to Nintendo Switch instead, although Hino does go on to admit that development is still in its very early stages.

name: US Police ATV Quad Bike Plane Transport Game
USA 2020
summary:
The year 2020 has arrived. A herd of fuckin' ugly reptilians are rushing from the outer space.
Crime rate skyrocketed! United States of America is ruined! Wipe out all 12 billion of the green scum!

name: US Police limousine Car Quad Bike Transporter Game
summary: Enjoy Transporting US Police limousine cars in transporter truck and aeroplane !

name: USA Truck Driving School: Off-road Transport Games
Usual John
summary: Usual John is a retro action shooter, in the style of old dandy games and NES.The game contains several different locations and many kinds of enemies, each has its own abilities and characteristics.

name: Useless Box
summary: Useless Box - first person arcade game, where is sly villain who wants to take over the world, destroying the country and appropriating them in the game.

name: USSR 2021
summary: In 1987, an unknown object fell on the territory of USSR. After a fall in a radius of 50 kilometers from the epicenter, any connection with all populated areas is completely lost. In 2021 satellite images revealed anomalous formations in the radius of the fall of the object.

name: Usurpator
summary: Grab your sword and purge the land of evil forces in Usurpator. In this MMO light melee slasher you will meet many other warriors on your quest as you unlock mighty weapons and learn devastating skills. Form allegiances with friends and battle your way to glory!

name: Us Lovely Corpses
summary: A short surreal-horror-romance visual novel about helping a friend. Go through the house, cut the roses, and save the girl. Just remember: the monster knows you're here. There will be puzzles that you can only solve with hints from the roses, so try to keep an open ear while doing your job.

name: Usagiri
summary: Become a patron of two fluffy bunny girls in this light and cute Visual Novel, romantic comedy mixed with science-fiction and fantasy.

name: Useless Box: The Game
summary: This game is exactly like a Useless Box but better because it's a video game about hitting a switch on a Useless Box (still no purpose). Want to spend hours flipping a switch and accomplishing nothing? This game is for you! As an added bonus, the box will tell you stories as well as reveal unlocks!

name: US Spy: Mission in Russia
summary: In this game, you have to become a spy from the USA. Your key goal is to incite a revolution in Russia. It's the right time to bribe officials and lawmakers just to make them doing those unacceptable things and accepting ridiculous laws. People have to get out on the street and riot.

name: Usotsuki Shangurira
summary: This is the sorrowful tale that takes place in the town where the sun never rises, Shangri-La. A girl known as the the saviour of the town — the ‘Usotsuki’ — and a group of young men, each with their own assigned roles, must learn to forgive each other’s lies……

name: Usavich - Game no Jikan
summary: The DS game is a mini-game collection, and tries manage to capture the absolutely hilarious nature of the anime.

name: User Is Typing // Message Sent
summary: A game of instant messaging and anxiety

name: USS Darkstar
summary:
USS Darkstar is a Half-Life mod created by Neil Manke and his team, largely based in Canada. The mod follows Gordon Freeman and several other scientists on board USS Darkstar in the year 2066, a large exploratory starship that resembles the Nostromo from the movie Alien.

USS Darkstar takes place in 2066 on board a Zoological Research Vessel in which they study and investigate various aliens from unexplored sectors of the galaxy.

You are Dr. Gordon Freeman, a brilliant researcher who has always had problems waking up on time...

name: USA Truck Simulator
summary: Travel across USA as king of the roads, where you are a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! USA Truck Simulator offers everything a trucker’s heart desires!

name: Usagi: Yasei no Touhai - Yamashiro Mahjong-hen
summary: A tag-team Mahjong game featuring the cast and setting of the manga series Usagi: Yasei no Touhai, with each character sporting unique abilities and styles of play.

name: US Navy Sea Conflict
summary: Join the elite pilots of the US NAVY and attack the ships threatening your fleet. From your aircraft carrier, hunt down enemy battleships and win the naval battle. You will play with modern warships and jet fighter in combats that enhance the player experience for better maneuvers against the best naval machines.

name: Useful Cat
summary: Useful Cat is an arcade and mind game. A quick reaction and a keen mind will bring you closer to victory over the approaching danger. Placing explosives, solve math problems quickly and correctly, on which everything depends!

name: Usurper: Soulbound
summary: Usurper: Soulbound is a tough Rogue-lite Action RPG where players are trapped without a physical body in a horrifying dimension and must possess the bodies of their enemies and other heroes alike as they fight their way back.

name: Use Your Outside Voice, Richie Tozier!
summary: An interactive alternate ending for the 2019 movie It Chapter Two. Playing as Richie Tozier, you return to the house on Neibolt Street to relive the events of the movie and try to get everyone out alive.

name: USSR Chan: Hentai Puzzle Game
summary: Relaxing puzzle game to keep you in a good mood in true soviet/ussr environments

name: Uspavanka
summary: Nightmares - all children see them sometimes. But what if in provincial Russia there are kids so harsh they can defeat the vile creatures from dreams?

name: USC: Counterforce
summary: In USC: Counterforce players are tasked with leading a group of Space Commandos in turn-based squad tactics combat inspired by the likes of UFO/XCOM, Space Hulk, and Aliens. The players’ commandos have been sent to a planetary body to investigate and take down a powerful alien threat. Players must discover the truth behind the demise of the planet’s colony and plan an efficient strategy to protect humanity from this threat. They will have the opportunity to fend off aliens with their friends thanks to a local co-op mode (Hot-seat or using Remote Play together).

name: Us Against Aliens
summary: Us Against Aliens is a survival shooter game on a spaceship that flies towards Earth. On the ship, something is constantly happening and you need to solve these problems along the way by shooting back from aliens who are constantly hunting you

name: USS Tempest: Spaceship Simulator
summary: Crewman, you are lost in deep space and threats are lurking everywhere. Survive and bring you and your allies back to known space. It's in your hands!

name: Usagi
summary: Usagi is an English Yume Nikki fangame. In this game, the player takes control over a girl named Umiko as she explores her dreams. Once in the dream world, Umiko can visit numerous surreal worlds, find effects that change her appearance (and give her new abilities) and collect Mementos, which are needed in order to complete the game. While exploring the dream world, the player is encouraged to interpret the different events, locations and NPCs he/she encounters to uncover Umikos backstory.

name: Usagi Shima
summary: Usagi Shima is a relaxing, idle bunny collecting game. You’ve been tasked as caretaker of an abandoned island — as you decorate it over time, curious (but adorable!) bunny visitors start to appear! Buy toys, plants, and build structures on an abandoned island to entice curious bun tourists to pay your island a visit. Discover, take photos, and make friends with a variety of bunnies that visit based on how you’ve decorated and arranged the island.

name: Usagi Health Club
summary: A casual visual novel with minigames that let you had fun and reward you with having special time with the bunny girls. Get choose who you want to be your escort girl for the night and play minigames to win special scene as a reward! But be careful not to be too addicted.

name: Usagi na Panic
summary:
Usagi na Panic is a side-scrolling action platform game released by Nihon Softec on Febuary 24, 1995 for the PC-9801.

This game is a cute and colorful action platformer which is divided into ten stages. The heroin uses a sword and has a range of various moves. Ramy can jump, is able to block enemy attacks with a shield, and can execute dash attacks. She can also throw projectiles which you can use to strike enemies from a far. Bombs can be set in order to trap the enemies, nonetheless with a limited number of use.

A sequel was developed on the same machine bringing some modifications to the gameplay, under the title Usagi na Panic 2 - Penpenjima no Hihou.

name: USAC: Code Breach
summary: USAC: Code Breach is a unique coop experience based on a French cyberpunk universe. As a special police unit, you and your partner are brought to investigate a sudden shutdown of a research facility. Between reflection and action, you must survive a situation that is beyond you.

name: U.S.G. A New Beginning
summary: STG/RPG hybrid developed in RPG Maker XP featuring a strength/weakness battle system and character levelling.

name: Use Your Psychic Powers at Applebee's
summary: You are a Psychic Brand Ambassador for Schtupmeister Beer. Listen to the thoughts of customers at the local Applebee's and convince them to try your syrupy ale. But will being in these peoples' heads convince you to get involved in their lives?

name: US Basketball HD
summary:
Become basketball star wherever you go!
When there is no opportunity to play real basketball, enjoy virtual US Basketball!
Who says that basketball can be played just with basketball on the sports ground? Compete with your friends on the screen of your devices using various spherical objects with unique characteristics – bowling and billiard balls, and even symbolic ball characters.
Take the most comfortable ball and set up records!
Playing basketball visit famous places of the USA!

name: UsoNatsu: The Summer Romance Bloomed From a Lie
summary: This is a story about finding love to overwrite the feelings for the one they held dearest. A girls love visual novel about summer, love and adolescence.

name: U.S. Youth Soccer: Power-Up Soccer
summary: Featuring both boy and girl players out on the field, this family-oriented soccer game offers fast and fun play for the family.

name: Use Your Mind
summary: A simple Preist and Devil puzzle by Miniclip.

name: Use Boxmen
summary: Use Boxmen is a tricky platform puzzler whose premise is exactly what it says on the tin. The main character can create clones of himself to interact with the surroundings and help him safely obtain the special box that’s located somewhere in the level.

name: Use Holy Water!
summary: The undead are on a rampage and the only thing stopping them is you, a shotgun, and a few bottles of holy water! (well yes you also get shurikens, lightning, and acid rain) Featuring five difficulty settings and two gameplay modes, Use Holy Water is a great way to kill some time by killing some zombies!

name: USS-Enterprise
summary: USS-Enterprise is an unofficial strategy game based on Star Trek, where you are James Kirk, and your mission is to destroy all Klingon ships in the galaxy.

name: Useless Demon Lord
summary:
Lucille is an unemployed single woman living alone in her apartment, stewing in feelings of anxiety and inadequacy... but then without warning and due to a rather strange magical mix-up, she is summoned to be the new Demon Lord in another world!

The demons aren't doing so well lately, and they're now relying on their new boss to return them to their glory days. Will Lucille be able to take this as an opportunity for a fresh start and thrive even in a world that wants her dead, or will she crumble under the pressure and return to her old shut-in ways?

name: Usurper
summary: A turn-based roguelike deckbuilder where your King is your strongest weapon. Play cards from your deck to drop units onto the battlefield and checkmate your opponent. Build your Deck, Upgrade your Ruler, and Claim the Throne!

name: U-Sing 2: Australian Edition
summary: A version of U-Sing 2 that features Australian music.

name: Usher.
summary: Horror puzzle/exploration game where you'll have to uncover a horrifying truth about a mysterious island. Use combat and movement mechanics to explore a small island and pact withs strange gods to unlock new habilities.

name: Used Cars Simulator
summary: Used Cars Simulator - trade used or stolen cars, fix and customize them, drive around, and explore the open world! Grow your business, complete quests, and have fun with a physics-based sandbox!

name: Usual June
summary: Hang out, fight monsters, and discover your town’s darkest secrets in Usual June, a third person action game about summer break and the end of the world.

name: Usagito Watashi
summary:
Made for a 'A Game By It's Cover 2016', based on the fantastic coverart by Achabox!

This details the adventures of Reido and Dr. Asagi as they wake up to a world under fire from all varieties of cosmic threat!

Experience the joys of space debris with a self destructive attitude, space stations long abandoned with stench of all the remnants of lives gone by, and also facing off with the immensity of the stars in classical famicom fashion.

name: Usemono Terminal
summary: A puzzle escape room game to reunite lost items with their owners.

name: Usemono Taminaru 2
summary: This is Usemono Terminal. It is the terminal station for lost things. Help lost items return to their owners once again.

name: USG
summary: 'USG' Is a captivating vertical shoot 'em up featuring hand-drawn animations and a unique art style. Customize your run with multiple weapon upgrades

name: Use Turbo To
summary: Maneuver with precision through a never-ending, difficulty increasing, and procedurally-generated barrage of stages. "Use Turbo To" bolt and ram through many dangerous encounters in this arcade score attack precision runner.

name: Usual
summary: Enjoy the quiet life in the Japanese countryside. You can relax and spend your time doing some housework. A walk around the neighborhood and relaxing on the sofa in the sunlight will help you recover from the daily grind.

name: US School Simulator Game
summary: A classic campus-style simulation game that simulates some events and daily life on campus

name: Ushuaïa, Le Jeu: À la Poursuite des Biotrafiquants
summary:
A 3rd action-adventure game about saving nature and the animals.
You play as Lena Green, a member of the Ushuaïa Sentinels nature protection organization.
Your mission: to put an end to the activities of biotraffickers.
Run, jump, infiltrate, investigate, coach your teammates... to complete your extreme mission!

name: Usurper Ghoul
summary: An exploratory game about a fallen kingdom. Made with GB Studio, PyxelEdit, and Milkytracker by evandahm.

name: Use Your Words 2
summary:
“The party game for funny people and their unfunny friends” is back!

The cult hit Use Your Words has all-new prompts and twice as many mini-games where you compete to write the funniest punchline – we set ‘em up, and you knock ‘em down! Players can use their phones or tablets as controllers, so it’s easy to jump in and seamless to play. And if you can’t think of a punchline, you can use one of our sneaky "Decoy” answers to lay a trap for your opponents… all with beautiful new visuals by artist Andrew Kolb!

name: USA Nature's Trails Jigsaw Edition
summary: Step into the captivating world of "USA Nature's Trails Jigsaw Edition" a puzzle journey that combines the thrill of piecing together intricate puzzles with the breathtaking beauty of America's diverse landscapes.

name: Usagi Sekai: Bunny Shaman
summary: Fight against the corruption using your deck of offensive, defensive and special cards. Find the evil talismans infecting the Village and find new powerful cards to add into your deck. Explore a unique atmospheric world inhabited by Bunnies.

name: USAID Approvals Department
summary: Play as a relaxed Woke DEI hire in USAID's Approvals Department, an outlandish ASMR and LOFI style US Government sim: review request, Approve or Deny, then File It before vacationing on a gifted yacht ride. Process absurd funding requests, dodge DOGE investigators, and avoid getting “Epsteined"

name: Usersleepwalker
summary: usersleepwalker is a short pointnclick, abstract, horror and shooter where sleepless nights stretch on in the search for solace.

name: USA Nature's Trails Jigsaw Edition: Expansion Pack 1
summary: The new DLC for "USA Nature's Trails Jigsaw Edition - Expansion Pack 1" introduces 16 breathtaking puzzles, enriching your journey through America's natural wonders.

name: USA Nature's Trails Jigsaw Edition: Expansion Pack 2
summary: The new DLC for "USA Nature's Trails Jigsaw Edition - Expansion Pack 2" introduces 16 breathtaking puzzles, enriching your journey through America's natural wonders.

name: USA Nature's Trails Jigsaw Edition: Expansion Pack 3
summary: The new DLC for "USA Nature's Trails Jigsaw Edition - Expansion Pack 3" introduces 16 breathtaking puzzles, enriching your journey through America's natural wonders.

name: USA Nature's Trails Jigsaw Edition: Expansion Pack 4
summary: The new DLC for "USA Nature's Trails Jigsaw Edition - Expansion Pack 4" introduces 16 breathtaking puzzles, enriching your journey through America's natural wonders.

name: USB-bot
summary: Embark on an electrifying 2D platform puzzle adventure in USB-BOT, where a small, disconnected USB sets out on a quest to reunite with the device it was once a part of.

name: Used Car Tycoon Game
summary: You will run a used car dealership from scratch. Buy and repair cars, hire staff, unlock facilities and expand marketing to attract more customers and increase profits. Build your used car empire and become a Car Tycoon.

name: USD Clicker
summary: The most simple clicker game with endless USD cash

name: Useless Timmy
summary: Useless Timmy is a platform game where you have to complete each level as quickly as possible. There are several islands, each with their own unique mechanics. Have fun :)

name: UsadaMaze
summary: Kidnapped and awakening in a strange room… a small creature that looks like a rabbit—but isn’t—greets you."UsadaMAZE" is an adventure game with puzzle elements.

name: USA Army Soldier Simulator
summary: Military life. No shortcuts.
